{fundo} cor: #abaab7 {} Hi, I'm Fabio Sales, a self-taught creative developer, designer, and digital transformation consultant with over 30 years of experience in visual communication, data-driven storytelling, and complex digital projects {fundo} cor: #FDFFB6 altura: 50vh {} Here are selected works reflecting my creative vision, alongside projects where I led multidisciplinary teams: {imagem} nome: atbl-app.png tamanho: G tags: Code, UX/UI, Project managment {} ATBL web app. My most recent work is a lightweight web app that puts ATBL’s daily workflows in your pocket — product updates, stock control, image uploads, sales orders, and assembly dashboards — all connected via API to the Sankhya ERP. By streamlining these processes, the company achieved a 12.5% increase in annual revenue over the past few years. tags: Code, UX/UI, Project managment {imagem} nome: germanico.png tamanho: P tags: Design, Project managment {} Disruptive project with measurable impact: Estadão’s new print format. I led the newspaper’s full redesign — from industrial press reconfiguration and advertiser communication to graphic design, newsroom training, and content migration to digital. As project manager, I also directed the business plan and execution that made the transformation feasible.

Despite concerns that a compact format might reduce readership or ad revenue, the rollout was successful and widely recognized as a modernization of the brand — delivering significant operational savings and driving an estimated R$7 million increase in EBITDA in 2022, reinforcing the newspaper’s long-term market relevance.

about.content: imagem: fabio_sales.png, PP h1: From Newsroom Leadership to Digital Engineering I am an executive leader and creative technologist with a unique dual background: 30 years shaping visual culture in mass media and a robust present in software engineering and digital transformation. For three decades, I directed multidisciplinary teams at Estadão, Diário de Notícias and Correio Braziliense, translating complex data into impactful storytelling for millions of readers. That experience taught me that design is useless without structure. The Pivot to Tech: Since 2023, I have codified that experience into digital products. I don't just "manage" transformation; I build it. My expertise now spans the full stack — from Svelte, React, SQL, Javascript and Python development to ERP implementation and process automation. Today, as the Director of Transformation and Innovation at ATBL, I combine strategic vision (Strategy) with hands-on execution (Code). Whether recognized as a LinkedIn Top Voice or delivering lectures at global conferences like SND and Malofiej, my mission remains the same: helping organizations thrive by merging design, technology, and business intelligence. {cronologia} titulo: Career Milestones periodo: ATBL (2025–Present). Driving corporate strategy, commercial operations, and administrative management, while leading technical initiatives like ERP integration and custom app development. periodo: Independent Consultant (2023–2025). Full-stack development (Svelte/Node) and business process automation for SMBs. periodo: Estadão (2005–2023). Executive Art Editor. Led the visual culture and digital migration for Brazil’s oldest newspaper, transforming complex communication projects into excellence in graphic journalism and visual design. periodo: Diário de Notícias (Portugal, 2003–2005). Art Director. Led a redesign recognized as the "Best Designed Newspaper in Iberia" (SND-e). periodo: Strategic Consulting & Training. Led visual strategy, redesigns, and newsroom training for international media (Milenio, Diario Gestión, La República) and major Brazilian groups (Grupo Positivo, Correio da Bahia and Jornal do Commercio). periodo: Academic & Thought Leadership. Former lecturer at ESPM and Senac. Speaker at major design summits (SND, Malofiej). {}
